articles.description: SATURDAY KITCHEN fans found themselves surprised so see a different celebrity chef in the kitchen this weekend.

articles.title: The SIMPSONS release specially commissioned cartoon of family holding Ukraine flags - Daily Mail
articles.description: The show's executive producer Al Jean said the rapid creation of such a politically relevant image did not happen 'very often' but it was important to be 'vigilant about defending freedom'.
articles.content:
The producers of US television programme The Simpsons have released a specially commissioned cartoon of the famous family holding Ukrainian flags as a 'show of solidarity' with the country.

articles.title: Strictly's Oti Mabuse 'replaced by Jowita Przystal' as she returns to show as professional dancer - OK! magazine
articles.description: Strictly Come Dancing star Oti Mabuse will be reportedly be replaced by Jowita Prztstal, as she is said to be heading back into the show’s line-up as a professional dancer in the autumn series
articles.content:

articles.description: Reality star Sue Radford, who has starred in TV shows with husband Noel and their 22 children, took to Instagram to say she feels like she's "living to work"

articles.title: Dolce & Gabbana embrace the metaverse at Milan fashion week - The Guardian
articles.description: Designers defy ‘cancellation’ to stitch together real and virtual catwalks in fantasy runway show
articles.content:
